label: 往生
対訳語: Birth (going and being born") into Amida's Pure Land of Supreme Bliss (gokuraku jōdo)"
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: upapatsyante. Originally the term referred to birth or rebirth into any other world, including various hells and heavens (see rokudō), but it is now used almost exclusively for birth in the Western Paradise. See also hongan entry. [阿弥陀、極楽浄土、六道、本願]
